room_title: Escape room "An Invitation From The Mystery Man" by Real Escape Game in San Francisco
room_description:
Glinting in the light, a row of suspicious red boxes line the wall on the mezzaine floor.
It is said that these mailboxes receive letters from all kinds of pecuilar individuals.
Only by solving the puzzles from the evelopes, will you be able to open the door to these mailboxes.
When a door opens, the next secret awaits. When the last door is open, you will have become part of the secret.
